channel.title: Dynamics Convergence on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Dynamics Convergence on 0x000216

item.title: Another day, another coming together.
item.description: This Atlanta trip was busy but productive. Tuesday started with a discussion about making custom reports. It was inspiring to hear how partners and customers use tools like SQL Reporting Services and Excel Report Builder. Next, I attended a packed session about AX and Sure Step, led by Chandru Shankar. The Q&A afterward was full of energy. My time in the Hands on Labs was spent exploring new content, including demos using Demomate technology.
